summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; establishing the Seacrest Dock project in the Capital Improvement Program; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to proceed with replacement work at Seacrest Park; making a contingent reimbursable appropriation to pay for the project; and contingently increasing the expenditure authority of the Department of Parks and Recreation in the 2001 Adopted Budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Elliott Bay Water Taxi Dock; Seacrest Dock Project
